unexpectedToast: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
uniqueViolation: This record already exists. Please use a unique identifier.
foreignKeyViolation: This operation cannot be completed because it references a missing record.
permissionDenied: You do not have permission to perform this action.
resourceNotFound: The requested resource could not be found.
timeout: The request timed out. Please try again.
missingRequiredField: A required field is missing. Please check your input.
projectLimitExceeded: Project limit exceeded. Your {{plan}} plan allows only {{count}} active projects. Upgrade or archive existing projects.
